DaD.creature

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.creature.Creature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hero, Npc

    public abstract class Creature
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Clovis on 07/02/2017. Mother class for every creature, both player and non player in the game.
    See Also:
    Npc, Hero, Env

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public int attack(Creature receiver)
        Call different function to calculate and inflict damage to a, receiver, creature.

        Amount of damage dealt is calculated by calcDamageDealt, reduce hp of the receiver and return this same amount.

        Parameters:
        receiver - Creature receiving the attack.
        Returns:
        int Amount of damage dealt
        See Also:
        FightFormulas

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Return true if hp value is below 1.
        Returns:
        boolean
